post_title: WTB: Del Howard Polar Bear - FOUND!
post_content:
Hey everyone,

Looking to get a Del Howard Polar Bear card for my collection. Condition doesn’t matter provided it’s not completely trashed but would also ask it doesn’t have major backloss.

If you have one you can make available, please let me know.  I’m available via PM.

Thanks!!

Jeff
Still looking for one!  Any condition!
